summary: The client requested to recreate Sprint 1 due to ongoing issues, and the SPRINT_PLANNING_ARCHITECT (Mike) analyzed the backlog and proposed a refreshed Sprint 1 focusing on US-006 (Basic Authentication) and US-008 (Supabase Integration) as foundational stories, seeking approval to proceed.

actions.task: Approve or provide feedback on the proposed Sprint 1 plan
Save and kick off execution of Sprint 1 upon approval

backlog_deltas.title: Recreate Sprint 1 with stories US-006 and US-008

risks.risk: Persistent issues with Supabase configuration during execution
risks.mitigation: Iterate and address in Sprint 2 if needed
